meanings.sent1: She always outskates her friends at the ice rink.
meanings.sent2: He outskates everyone in the neighborhood with his smooth moves.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to outskates the seal, but ended up slipping comically.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outskates her fears propelled her forward on the ice.
meanings.sent5: The champion outskates the competition with grace and skill.

meanings.definition: To skate faster or better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: During the race, he managed to outskates his opponents effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She always outskates her brother when they go skating together.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to outskates the dog, but the dog was too quick.
meanings.sent4: His passion for skating drives him to outskates anyone who challenges him.
meanings.sent5: The wind seemed to whisper secrets to those who outskates its howling voice.
